text:
Happy Retirement~
Enjoy! And Merry Christmas -Tom Rogers Infrastructure Engineer Pacteon

metadata.topic: Thanks, merry Christmas and so llong
metadata.subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] [patchmanagement] Thanks, merry Christmas and so llong
metadata.email_text_original:
[You don't often get email from trogers@schneiderequip.com. Learn why this is
important at https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification ] Happy Retirement~
Enjoy! And Merry Christmas -Tom Rogers Infrastructure Engineer Pacteon
-----Original Message----- From: 'Glen Johnson' via PatchManagement Sent:
Wednesday, December 20, 2023 12:45 PM To: ntsysadmin@googlegroups.com;
patchmanagement@googlegroups.com Subject: [EXTERNAL] [patchmanagement] Thanks,
merry Christmas and so llong Greetings. Today is my last work day as network
manager, IT coordinator and general tech person at Virginia Highlands Community
College where I have spent the past 40 years. I will officially retire on
December 31 and am looking forward to other adventures. I've been a member of
the ntsysadmin list longer that I can think about (my oldest saved email, a
joke, from that list is dated 2006) and the patch management list for several
years also. I wanted to take a second to express a heart felt THANK YOU to all
that participate in both of these most helpful lists. You have been an
invaluable part of making my career in IT a success. Thank you for sharing your
knowledge, advice and most of all, your time. I can't imagine being able to do
half of what I did without this great resource. Merry Christmas to those of you
that choose to celebrate this and best wishes to everyone. May patch Tuesdays be
calm and all your systems run smoothly over the coming years. Take care and so
long. Glen. --
Link: None
